sentences.english: We're all goin' the same way, just taking different roads to get there…
sentences.chinese: 我們都走向統一個方向，只是走的路不同罷了。

sentences.english: Its new resolution authority allows the regulator significant access to systemically relevant firms.

sentences.english: This system can be extended to realize the multi-center data acquisition, and the measurement of many-headed ignition coil.
sentences.chinese: 將此係統進行擴展可實現多頭點火線圈的測試。

sentences.english: As with everything else, look at nerves on a continuum.
sentences.chinese: 與其他方面一樣，要將神經型視爲一個連續統。

sentences.english: The results show that there are two kinds of net gain losses.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明級聯繫統存在着淨增益虧損。

sentences.english: Sun Quan, fearing for Ling Tong, ordered Lv Meng to bring him back to camp.
sentences.chinese: 孫權恐淩統有失，令呂蒙接應回營。

sentences.english: The original lucky star big market, packed with the latest version of the software trade.

sentences.english: Especially from the F cardinality, some new ideas on the continuum hypothesis are shown.
sentences.chinese: 特別對於連續統假設這一世界難題可能有新的啓示。

sentences.english: Top up weekly with Lubrication Engineers 4090-H1 Quinplex food-grade grease.
sentences.chinese: 每週須給此係統加滿食品級潤滑脂。

sentences.english: The Liangshang Formation mudstone is the direct cap rock of the Carboniferous gas pools.
sentences.chinese: 石炭系氣藏的直接蓋層是下二疊統梁山組泥岩層。

sentences.english: The article sets forth wideband IP access technique and relevant systems.
sentences.chinese: 本文闡述寬帶IP接入技術，以及相關係統。

sentences.english: The system executes simple harmonic motion .
The series product uses steel tube to connect , electrical inlet - wire must be noted.

sentences.chinese: 此係統採用了溢出計數和動態顯示的方法。
